Present location: BIBLIOTHECA ALEXANDRINA ANTIQUETIES MUSEUM [01/027] ALEXANDRIA BAAM
Name: Wide-Mouthed Pottery Jar Decorated with Lines
Description: The wide-mouthed pottery jar is adorned with lines. Lines are drawn around the neck, on which there is an inscription, and around the shoulders. Two lines are drawn under the shoulders, where the body of the jar starts. The shoulders are embellished with distorted red and black floral ornaments between the two lines. The lower part of the jar is decorated with engravings of vertical wavy lines. The base is also decorated with lines.
